subject: Booking system very slow this morning
description: I'm trying to book the sports hall at Riverside Community Centre for next week but the website is extremely slow. It's taken over 5 minutes just to load the search results and I still can't complete my booking. I need this sorted as I have a fitness class starting next Monday.
citizen_impact: Unable to complete booking, potential class cancellation

subject: Cannot book meeting room - website keeps timing out
description: Urgent - I need to book a meeting room for a council consultation session tomorrow. The website keeps timing out when I try to search for available rooms. This is affecting our community engagement work. Can someone please book room MR005 for tomorrow 2-4pm on my behalf?
citizen_impact: Critical community meeting at risk of cancellation

subject: Booking search not working properly
description: I'm trying to find available time slots for the community hall but the search is either very slow or shows error messages. When it does work, it seems to be showing strange results - some searches show no availability when I know there should be slots free. My elderly parents group needs to book their weekly meeting space.

subject: Payment failed after long wait - money taken but no booking
description: I waited nearly 30 minutes for the booking system to respond, finally got to the payment page, entered my card details and paid Â£15. The page then crashed with an error message but the money has been taken from my account. I don't have a booking confirmation and now I can't book the sports hall for my son's birthday party. This is completely unacceptable.
citizen_impact: Payment taken without service delivered, child's party at risk

subject: Website completely unresponsive
description: The community centre booking website is completely broken. I can't even get past the search page - it just shows a loading spinner forever. I need to book badminton courts for our club's regular sessions. We have 20 members depending on these bookings. Is there an alternative way to make bookings while this is being fixed?
citizen_impact: Sports club sessions cancelled, 20 members affected

subject: Booking system down - urgent business meeting needs venue
description: I run a local business and need to book a meeting room urgently for a client presentation this afternoon. The booking system has been down for over an hour. This is costing me business. Can someone from the council please call me immediately to arrange this booking over the phone? I need room MR008 from 3-5pm today.
citizen_impact: Business meeting cancellation, potential contract loss

subject: Multiple booking attempts failing
description: I've been trying to book a community hall for my daughter's dance group for the past 2 hours. Every time I try to complete a booking, the website either times out or shows an error. The girls have their performance next month and we desperately need rehearsal space. This is very frustrating and unprofessional.
citizen_impact: Dance group rehearsals disrupted, performance preparation affected

subject: System outage affecting charity event planning
description: Our charity is trying to organize a fundraising event and need to book the main community hall. The booking system has been completely unusable all morning. We have sponsors expecting confirmation of the venue and this delay is jeopardizing our entire event. We raise money for local food banks so this is really important. Please help urgently.
citizen_impact: Charity fundraising event at risk, community services affected

subject: Can't access booking system at all
description: I'm trying to book our weekly pensioners' coffee morning venue but the website won't load at all now. We have 30+ elderly residents who attend these sessions for social contact. Without the venue booking, we'll have to cancel and many of our members will be very disappointed. Some of them don't have other social opportunities during the week.
citizen_impact: Elderly community social group cancelled, isolation concerns

subject: Booking system failure causing multiple cancellations
description: I manage bookings for three different community groups and none of us can access the system. We have yoga classes, art groups, and a toddler group all needing venues this week. The system has been broken for hours now. This is affecting dozens of families and community members. We need immediate assistance and alternative booking methods.
citizen_impact: Multiple community groups affected, dozens of citizens impacted

subject: Partial booking completed but confirmation missing
description: After waiting over an hour, I managed to get through part of the booking process for a sports hall. I filled in all the details and clicked submit, but then got an error message. I'm not sure if my booking went through or not. I haven't received any confirmation email. My fitness class is supposed to start tomorrow and I need to know if we have the venue.
citizen_impact: Fitness class uncertainty, potential last-minute cancellation

subject: System seems to be improving but still slow
description: I just managed to complete a booking after several attempts. The system seems to be working better now but it's still quite slow. It took about 10 minutes to complete what should be a 2-minute booking process. Just wanted to report that things seem to be getting better but not quite back to normal yet.
citizen_impact: Service restored but performance still degraded

subject: Booking now working - thank you
description: Just wanted to say thank you to the technical team. I was having problems earlier this morning but I've just successfully booked a meeting room for our book club. The system is working normally again. Appreciate the quick response to fix the issues.

subject: System back to normal speed
description: The booking system appears to be fully operational again. I was able to search for and book a sports hall for our basketball club without any delays. Response times are back to normal. Thanks for fixing whatever the problem was this morning.
